short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly verify which account you're logged into on Twitter.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Puts your avatar in the top menu on Twitter.com so you can easily double-check which account is logged in. Great for juggling multiple user accounts.

Works with both the new 2014 re-design (white toolbar) and the 2013 design (dark grey toolbar) of Twitter.com.
